short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show or hide the sidebar in courses. Developed by Alpinstang.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that adds a sidebar toggle button on https://academy.zerotomastery.io/ courses. Expands the video to fit the new empty space. Great for smaller screens or a side-by-side layout so you can compare your code and follow along in real-time..
